title: Ehab El-Ali
bio: Ehab is the Director of Information Security at Deepgram. With over fifteen years of combined IT experience in InfoSec and Systems Engineering, he has overseen the management of HIPAA, HITRUST, SOC-2, GDPR, CCPA, and PCI DSS compliance programs. He ensures that Deepgram can rapidly deliver feature enhancements and without compromising the security and privacy of customer data.
